message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_PERSON_MATCHES
message.locale: Multiple person records were found for memberID %1s.

message.name: ERR_NO_PERSON_MATCHES
message.locale: No person records found for memberID %1s.

message.name: ERR_NO_RECORD_FOUND
message.locale: No payment was found corresponding to the reference number.

message.name: ERR_PMT_NOT_ISSUED
message.locale: Cannot cancel a payment that is not in issued status.
